com.example.hbaltz.aton.rajawali.renderables

Class Grid

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.rajawali3d.ATransformable3D
      • org.rajawali3d.Object3D
        • org.rajawali3d.primitives.Line3D
          • com.example.hbaltz.aton.rajawali.renderables.Grid
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<org.rajawali3d.Object3D>, org.rajawali3d.scenegraph.IGraphNodeMember, org.rajawali3d.visitors.INode

    public class Grid
extends org.rajawali3d.primitives.Line3D
    Rajawali object which represents the 'floor' of the current scene. This is a static grid placed in the scene to provide perspective in the various views.
